entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unclear how to catch "System.Exception: Correlation failed." and prevent HTTP 500 #45620
  • [Blazor] NavigationLock LocationChangingContext CancellationToken cancelled every time navigation location changes #45618
  • Perf regression: https #45615
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #45614
  • VS 2022 17.4.3 throw a exception at startup: The startup hook simple assembly name 'Watch.BrowserRefresh.dll' is invalid #45610
  • Cannot override authentication in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing #45608
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor doesn't render components inside `template` tags #45605
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting RateLimiterPolicy GetPartitionAsync #45603
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext_express, plainTextSansFilter #45602
  • Perf improvement: json_actix, plaintext_express #45601
  • IServiceProvider.GetService throw exception “Ambiguous match found.” #45600
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to implement components using current DataAnnotationsValidator when multiple CascadingValues are required. #45598
  • Transient local build failures: error MSB3491: Could not write lines to file #45596

Closed

  • Blazor - Virtualization, mixing data between items on first load #45565
  • Blazor HotReload throws `System.NullReferenceException` when using Serilog #45536
  • Remove IISAuthenticationHandler as suggested by existing comments #45355
    8.0-preview1
  • CookieBuilder SameSite XML documentation is incorrect #41871
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext_nodejs #45570
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #45592
  • I have searched the existing issues #45613
  • Blazor Server - Html Source Blazor Info #45607
  • Add ASPNETCORE_URLS_GRPC change #45563
  • Net7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication no longer includes query string paramters in the return URL #45609
  • Blazor @bind:after not working on .NET 7 RTM release #44957
  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter("prompt", "select_account") does nothing #44854
    7.0.x
  • net7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #44981
    7.0.x
  • Regression, Blazor WASM OIDC login callback to not sent to the requested page when published #44973
    7.0.x
  • ReadOnly exception from dotnet core middleware - Kubernetes container pods with a read-only filesystem #45476
  • Investigate enabling dotnet-maestro-bot for release/2.1 #24119

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a default value for SpaProxyKeepRunning #45616
    area-runtime
  • ChecksumValidator: support SHA256 #45612
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm component EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to impleme… #45599
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
    8.0-preview1
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [blazor] remove custom loader for .wasm file #45611
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2067454 #45566
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Harden IPv6Any error handling #45529
    area-runtime, Test failures
  • Add support for {**catch-all routes} in Blazor #45587
    area-blazor
  • Adding untyped JsonTypeInfo overloads #45593
    area-runtime
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
